question: India signed a MoU on peaceful uses of outer space and MoU on cooperation in youth matters with this country.
explanation:
India and Armenia have signed three agreements in a bilateral meeting. The three agreements are;

1. The two countries signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) on peaceful uses of outer space. 
2. Another MoU on cooperation in youth matters 
3. Program of cultural cooperation for the years 2017-2020.
